mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST SET SUBHOLIDAY_WORK_DAY_YN = 'Y' WHERE SUBHOLIDAY_WORK_DAY = #{vacWorkDt} AND SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = '11'

SELECT VUH.*, VCD.SUBHOLIDAY_DT_CODE_NM FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_USE_HIST VUH JOIN CAM_INSIDE.DJ_SUBHOLIDAY_CODE VCD ON VUH.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID = VCD.SUBHOLIDAY_CODE_ID

/* getUserVacList */
SELECT VUI.EMP_SEQ, VUI.EMP_NAME_KR, VUI.DEPT_NAME, VUI.POSITION_NAME, VUI.DUTY_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(VUI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, VUI.ACTIVE, VC.APPLY_YEAR, CONCAT(VC.APPLY_YEAR, '-01-01') AS ST_APPLY_DATE, CONCAT(VC.APPLY_YEAR, '-12-31') AS EN_APPLY_DATE, VC.GRANT_DAY, VC.MDTN_DAY, VC.EXTRA_DAY, VC.USE_DAY, ((VC.GRANT_DAY + VC.MDTN_DAY + VC.EXTRA_DAY) - (VC.USE_DAY)) AS REMAIN_VAC, VC.ACTIVE, VC.HOLIDAY_ID FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_HOLIDAY VC LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO VUI ON VC.EMP_SEQ = VUI.EMP_SEQ
AND VUI.USE_YN = #{active}
AND (VUI.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userNm},'%') OR VUI.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userNm},'%'))
AND VUI.DEPT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deptName},'%')
AND (VUI.DP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{positionDutyNm},'%') OR VUI.DP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{positionDutyNm},'%'))
AND VC.APPLY_YEAR = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND VC.ACTIVE = #{vacStatus} AND VC.APPLY_YEAR = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND VC.ACTIVE = #{vacStatus} AND VC.APPLY_YEAR IS NULL

/* getUserVacListStat */ /*1(연차), 3(오전반차), 4(오후반차), 5(병가), 6(공가), 7(경조휴가), 8(출산휴가), 9(대체휴가), 10(근속포상휴가), 11(휴일근로)*/
SELECT VUI.emp_seq, VUI.emp_name_kr, VUI.dept_name, VUI.position_name, VUI.duty_name, Date_format(VUI.join_day, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, VUI.active, VC.apply_year, Concat(VC.apply_year, '-01-01') AS ST_APPLY_DATE, Concat(VC.apply_year, '-12-31') AS EN_APPLY_DATE, VC.grant_day, VC.mdtn_day, VC.extra_day, VC.use_day, ( ( VC.grant_day + VC.mdtn_day + VC.extra_day ) - ( VC.use_day ) ) AS REMAIN_VAC, VC.active, VC.holiday_id, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ANNUAL, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MORNING, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AFTERNOON, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SICK, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS PUBLICHOLI, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CONDOLENCES, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MATERNITY, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ALTERNATIVE, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LONGAWARD, Sum(CASE WHEN VUH.subholiday_code_id = 11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HOLIDAYWORK FROM cam_inside.dj_holiday VC LEFT JOIN cam_hr.dj_emp_info VUI ON VC.emp_seq = VUI.emp_seq LEFT JOIN cam_inside.dj_subholiday_use_hist VUH ON VUI.emp_seq = VUH.reg_emp_seq WHERE VUH.subholiday_code_id IN ( 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 ) GROUP BY VUI.emp_seq, VUI.emp_name_kr, VUI.dept_name, VUI.position_name, VUI.duty_name, Date_format(VUI.join_day, '%Y-%m-%d'), VUI.active, VC.apply_year, Concat(VC.apply_year, '-01-01'), Concat(VC.apply_year, '-12-31'), VC.grant_day, VC.mdtn_day, VC.extra_day, VC.use_day, ( ( VC.grant_day + VC.mdtn_day + VC.extra_day ) - ( VC.use_day ) ), VC.active, VC.holiday_id;
